issue.title: [C++] Add string struct extract kernel using re2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10195](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10195). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to Pandas' str.extract a way to convert a string to a struct of strings using the re2 regex library (when having named captured groups).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10195?focusedCommentId=17326557) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8459
